class glob_utils.repository.QueryBuilder(*, field: str, query: dict[str, str | int | float | bool | list[str] | Query | list[Query] | list[str | int | float | bool | list[str]]] | dict[str, str | int | float | bool | list[str]] | dict[str, list[Query]] = {})[source]

Query Builder pattern with operation overload for Firebase, DynamoDB and Pinecone.

glob_utils.utils module

Utility functions.

glob_utils.utils.async_io(func: Callable[[P], T]) → Callable[[P], Awaitable[T]][source]

Decorator to convert an IO bound function to a coroutine by running it in a thread pool.

glob_utils.utils.chunker(seq: Sequence[T], size: int) → Generator[Sequence[T], None, None][source]

A generator function that chunks a sequence into smaller sequences of the given size.

Arguments: seq – The sequence to be chunked. size – The size of the chunks.

glob_utils.async_io(func: Callable[[P], T]) → Callable[[P], Awaitable[T]][source]

Decorator to convert an IO bound function to a coroutine by running it in a thread pool.

glob_utils.chunker(seq: Sequence[T], size: int) → Generator[Sequence[T], None, None][source]

A generator function that chunks a sequence into smaller sequences of the given size.

Arguments: seq – The sequence to be chunked. size – The size of the chunks.

glob_utils.robust(func: ~typing.Callable[[~P], ~typing.Awaitable[~glob_utils._decorators.T]], *, max_retries: int = 3, wait: int = 1, max_wait: int = 3, exceptions: tuple[~typing.Type[Exception], ...] = (<class 'httpx.RequestError'>,)) → Callable[[P], Awaitable[T]][source]

A decorator to apply error handling, logging and retrying to a coroutine. The retrying is configurable with sensible defaults for the following parameters: max_retries – Maximum number of retries. Defaults to 3. wait – Initial wait time in seconds. Defaults to 1. max_wait – Maximum wait time in seconds. Defaults to 3. exceptions – Tuple of exceptions to retry on. Defaults to (RequestError,).
